name: Quest Test
description:
Note: This is for Oculus Headsets Only.  To Play On Quest, Please use Oculus Link or Download APK and use Sidequest.  If using Rift/Rift S/Quest with Link: Unzip downloaded file, Plug in your headset and run Quest Test.exe, and Enjoy.

Please Note that this is a Prototype and bugs may occur.

                                                                 AND THIS IS VR ONLY!

                                  

How To Side Load Games On Oculus Quest In Under 2 Minutes! By: BMF

Oculus Developer Account - https://dashboard.oculus.com

ADB Drivers - https://developer.oculus.com/download...

SideQuest Download - https://sidequestvr.com/#/download

SideLoading Cable - https://amzn.to/3a2mnhs
